name: The Demon Crystal
description: The Demon Crystal, produced in 1984 by YMCAT, achieved great success as the pioneer of the action RPG genre and became a nation-wide hit. The first game in a trilogy, it is known as a "legendary game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: キーボードプレイ対応
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: USBゲームパッド(8方向2ボタン)推奨
